h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is an automatic reward, granted upon completing Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. Once you defeat Black Bear Guai and exit the chapter mural, you will get it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 4'.
The content is as follows:
The next Mind Core is an automatic reward, granted upon completing Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. Once you defeat Black Bear Guai and exit the chapter mural, you will get it.
